meanings.definition: Resembling a net in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The spider's web was so netlike, it caught all the insects easily.
meanings.sent2: The basketball net had a netlike texture that made it easy to grip.
meanings.sent3: The netlike pattern on the dress made it look like a piece of art.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a netlike bun, holding it all in place.
meanings.sent5: The netlike clouds covered the sky, creating a beautiful sunset.

meanings.definition: Having a net-like pattern or design.
meanings.sent1: The curtains had a netlike design that let in just the right amount of light.
meanings.sent2: The tablecloth had a netlike pattern that added a touch of elegance to the dining room.
meanings.sent3: The netlike print on the wallpaper gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a netlike overlay that added a unique touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The netlike fence around the garden kept the rabbits out while still looking stylish.
